events.description: Join us as we seek to raise awareness of the Climate Emergency on Bradford, and to highlight the roles that certain banks are playing in funding climate chaos. Please bring flags and banners if you have them.
events.title: Bradford Banking Action

events.description: Four day action 0930 - 1400, at HSBC and Barclays involving stickering, banners, possible road blocks, oil pouring, chalking, bank scrubbing on the first day and performance by the "Green Spirits".

address_lines: Barclays Newton Abbot · 40 Courtenay Street · Newton Abbot · Devon · TQ12 2EA

events.title: HSBC/Barclays Newton Abbot

events.description:
Sheffield’s collaborative environmental drama group Act Now will be putting Barclays on trial for their environmental crimes!

Barclays are Europe’s biggest investor in fossil fuels and a significant target of the ongoing Rebellion in London, which is demanding an immediate end to all new fossil fuel investments. Join us to find out just how guilty Barclays really are.

Come and Observe, Cheer & Boo & Make a Lot of Noise

And bring any relevant placards and banners.
events.title: Barclays On Trial

events.description:
Procession, outreach, samba band, speeches. Dress in black and be a climate bandit. To highlight planet destroying activities of local business Rockhopper Exploration. They’re suing the Italian Government under the Energy Charter Treaty and will use the proceeds to exploit enormous oil reserves in the Falkland Islands. In an emergency, there’s always someone who comes up smelling of roses. In this case, it’s Rockhopper Exploration of Salisbury.

If the world is to transition to zero carbon, international treaties such as the Energy Charter Treaty need to end

A joint action of XR Salisbury & XR Wimborne
events.title: Salisbury’s Shameful Secret - Rockhopper Oil Exploration

events.description:
Join XR Salisbury and XR Wimborne this Friday on Market Square, Salisbury, at 12 noon to call out local oil company, Rockhopper Exploration

In an emergency, there’s always someone who comes up smelling of roses. In this case, it’s Rockhopper Exploration of Warner House, 123 Castle Street, Salisbury, Wiltshire SP1 3TB
Join us on Friday to protest against their cynical exploitation of international treaties and to tell them to stop destroying our climate

Rockhopper Exploration plc is suing the Italian Government under the Energy Charter Treaty because it’s been stopped from drilling for oil in the Adriatic and will use the proceeds to exploit an enormous oilfield off the coast of the Falklands. How can this be allowed to happen during a climate and ecological emergency?

What’s the answer? If the world is to transition to zero carbon, international treaties such as the Energy Charter Treaty need to end.

*Dress code*
Wear black and tie a white hankie or similar around the lower half of your face, bandit style. We will be bringing with us a limited supply of prepared bandit masks with the words “Rockhopper Climate Bandits” on them.

*Action details*
Arrive midday for samba band, speeches, outreach, banners, flags, leaflets etc
Procession to Rockhopper office. Samba band, speeches, outreach.
Return to Market Square. Samba band, speeches, outreach.
#ClimateEmergency
#EcologicalEmergency
#impossiblerebellion
events.title: Salisbury’s Shameful Secret - Rockhopper Oil Exploration

events.description: This is an addition to the weekly hight street climate strike in Canterbury led by Henry which will carry out crisis talk in the High Street. All welcome to observe and then join in.
events.title: Crisis Talks Launch over Lunch

events.description: We are asking people to bring tributes to create a memorial to all the people, species and places that have been harmed by climate change, to all that we have lost and will lose. Tributes can take the form of painted stones, flowers, art works, hand prints, poetry, statues, images of resistance or anything else people would like to bring. There will be a memorial service with speeches, some singing and space for people to make their own tributes to add to the memorial. We will be reaching out to members of the public to add their voices to the call for an immediate end to fossil fuel funding.
events.title: Climate Justice Memorial Event Sheffield
